summary: Harriet Green, a beloved and radiant music hall star of the Edwardian era, has a guilty secret: She has a baby daughter, born out of wedlock. Harriet leaves her public and flees to South ... See full summary Â»
cast: Jessie Matthews|Sonnie Hale|Betty Balfour|Barry MacKay|Ivor McLaren|Hartley Power|Patrick Ludlow|Betty Shale|Marjorie Brooks|Buddy Bradley|Stewart Granger|Rita Grant|Miles Malleson|Charles Mortimer|Richard Murdoch|Cyril Smith|Norma Varden|Mona Washbourne
title: Siempre viva
